quotes.quote: Life is not happening to you. Life is responding to you.

Positive thinking is powerful thinking. If you want happiness, fulfillment, success and inner peace, start thinking you have the power to achieve those things. Focus on the bright side of life and expect positive results.
Feeling good about yourself is not the same thing as doing good. Good policy is more important than good feelings.
A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life.
Good attitudes among players do not guarantee a team's success, but bad attitudes guarantee it's failure.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
Live your everyday extraordinary!

A good attitude is really important. And a sense of optimism, someone who has ideas and isn't afraid to pitch them no matter what level she is. Someone who is proactive. Someone with efficiency and common sense. They don't always go hand-in-hand, common sense and, well, everything else.
Positive thinking is a good attitude to have. But positive thinking without any skills is a load of crap.
Be yourself and you can be anything.
Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
If you can quit, quit. If you can't quit, stop complaining this is what you chose.
It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
Our beliefs about what we are and what we can be precisely determine what we can be.
A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
If your attitude toward the world is good, you will obtain good results. If your attitude is excellent, excellent will your results.
What is the difference between an obstacle and an opportunity? Our attitude toward it. Every opportunity has a difficulty, and every difficulty has an opportunity.
A positive attitude may not solve all our problems but that is the only option we have if we want to get out of problems.
It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect It's successful outcome.
Start your day with good intentions and set yourself up for a good attitude. It's not what happens to you that matters but how you respond.
If you don't get everything you want, think of the things you don't get that you don't want.
An idea, when lighted, often glows to illuminate other ideas.
Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power working twenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
The block of granite which was an obstacle in the pathway of the weak, became a stepping-stone in the pathway of the strong.
Never give up. Things may be hard, but if you quit trying they'll never get better. Stop worrying and start trusting God. It will be worth it.
The one good thing about failure is that it makes you consider doing things a different way.
Your attitude is an expression of your values, beliefs and expectations.
Acceptance is the act of embracing what life presents to you with a good attitude.
Don't promote negativity online and expect people to treat you with positivity in person.
Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
Positive thinking is powerful thinking.
Sometimes it takes a wrong turn to get you to the right place.
Keeping your attitude positive gives you resilience, or bounce back ability, when the tough challenges come along.
